references.paper_title: nuScenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving
references.reason: It is the main dataset used for the open-loop evaluation of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: MP3: A unified model to map, perceive, predict and plan
references.reason: It is a state-of-the-art modular end-to-end autonomous driving method that is compared with the proposed method.

references.paper_title: BevFormer: Learning bird's-eye-view representation from multi-camera images via spatiotemporal transformers
references.reason: It provides the backbone for the BEV feature extraction that is used in the proposed method.
It is a state-of-the-art end-to-end autonomous driving method that is compared with the proposed method.

references.paper_title: VAD: Vectorized scene representation for efficient autonomous driving
references.reason: It is a state-of-the-art end-to-end autonomous driving method that is compared with the proposed method.
